profileText: a Delegate from North Carolina; born in Annapolis, Anne Arundel County, Md., July 30, 1724; studied law; was admitted to the bar and practiced; member of the North Carolina Provincial Congress, 1776; member of the State house of commons, 1781, 1783, 1784, and 1788; Member of the Continental Congress, 1785; nominated for judge, 1790; died c. June 29, 1797; interment location is unknown.
